title: Knowledge mining using the knowledge store feature of Azure Search
description:
An end to end walk through of how you ingest, enrich, project and analyze your data using the knowledge store feature of Azure Search with Vinod Kurpad.

https://aka.ms/KnowledgeStore

Re-visit your favorite part:
[00:25] Introduction
[02:25] Cognitive Search overview
[03:30] Knowledge store introduction
[05:13] Demo of knowledge store
[16:10] Results
